attributes.action: Urge the Becor House canteen to reduce the price of bacon rolls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the price of a bacon roll in the Erinaceous canteen in Becor House is £1.80 and this far exceeds the cost to make a bacon roll. The same company, in Croydon (where the cost of living is more expensive) charge just £1.40 for the same thing. I believe the price of bacon rolls should be reduced to around the £1.20 mark.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
